title: Software
description: A base scheme to describe research software

codeVersion.title: Software version
codeVersion.description: Version of a Research software using semantik versioning like major.minor.path, f.e. 1.3.2

developmentStatus.title: Development status
developmentStatus.description: Development status of the research software provided. One of 'Concept', 'WIP', 'Active', 'Inactive', 'Unsupported', 'Moved', 'Suspended', 'Abandoned'

codeRepository.title: Code repository
codeRepository.description: Link to the repository where the un-compiled source code is located, e.g. https://github.com/someOrga/somerepo

programmingLanguage.title: Programming Language
programmingLanguage.description: The programming language(s) used to implement the software (e.g. Python, C++, Matlab, Fortran, Java, Julia,...)

softwareRequirements.description: Dependencies that are necessary to get the software to run.
softwareRequirements.title: Software Requirements

softwareRequirementsName.title: Name
softwareRequirementsName.description: Name of the required software/library dependency

softwareRequirementsVersion.title: Version
softwareRequirementsVersion.description: Version of the required software/library dependency, e.g. 1.2.5

softwareRequirementsInfoUrl.title: Info URL
softwareRequirementsInfoUrl.description: Link to a page describing the software/library dependency, e.g. link to homepage, documentation, readthedocs

softwareRequirementsUrl.title: Download URL
softwareRequirementsUrl.description: Link to a download page of the software/library dependency

softwareHelp.title: Software Documentation / Help
softwareHelp.description: Link to a page with more information about the usage of the software provided
